dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Hello! Can you help me find a book in this library?

dialogues.speaker: Librarian
dialogues.text: Of course! What book are you looking for?

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: I need a book on ancient history, particularly about Egypt.

dialogues.speaker: Librarian
dialogues.text: Follow me, I will take you to the history section of the library.
